timeb.h¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

TIME

Description:

Provides structures and functions related to the curren time.

You can obtain the current time.

Since:

1.0

Version:

1.0

Summary¶

Data Structures¶

Data Structure Name

Description

timeb

Describes the time, accurate to millisecond.

Functions¶

Function Name

Description

ftime (struct timeb *tp)

int

Obtains the current time, accurate to milliseconds.
